attributes.action: Ban the use of Tasers in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
0ver 400 people around the world have died after being subjected to electric shock by Taser weapons. These weapons are lethal, not as claimed by the manufacturer non lethal. 

We do not want the people of the UK to start dying because of the use of these lethal weapons.

Police are human. Give a human a weapon and he/she will find an excuse to use it.

Ban them before our people start being killed by the people who are supposed to protect us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
